description: This vibrant green soup makes the best of spring asparagus and is extra delicious with a swirl of basil pesto.
name: Asparagus Soup with Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 350g asparagus, trimmed and chopped into stalks and tips
2.8 cup vegetable stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the butter in a large, deep pan and cook the asparagus tips for 3 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside. Add the rest of the butter and cook the onions for 6 minutes until soft.
Add the garlic, asparagus stalks and spinach and cook for 2-3 minutes. Pour over the vegetable stock, bring to the boil, remove from the heat and blitz until smooth with an immersion blender.
Serve in bowls with cracked black pepper and a swirl of pesto on top.
